Utility Functions Provided by the CTblLib Package
This chapter describes &GAP; functions that are provided by the CTblLib package but that might be of general interest.
For the moment, there are just two features to describe, the generation of &ATLAS; irrationalities from cyclotomic integers (see Section ), and the generation of information about the group structure from identifiers of character tables (see Section ).
